# believe_team_members (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "believe_team_members" "example_team_members" {
  member_type = "player"
  team_id = "team_id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `max_items` (Number) Max items to fetch, default: 1000
- `member_type` (String) Filter by member type
Available values: "player", "coach", "medical_staff", "equipment_manager".
- `team_id` (String) Filter by team ID

### Read-Only

- `items` (Attributes List) The items returned by the data source (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `assists` (Number) Total assists for the team
- `certifications` (List of String) Coaching certifications and licenses
- `character_id` (String) ID of the character (references /characters/{id})
- `goals_scored` (Number) Total goals scored for the team
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for this team membership
- `is_captain` (Boolean) Whether this player is team captain
- `is_head_kitman` (Boolean) Whether this is the head equipment manager
- `jersey_number` (Number) Jersey/shirt number
- `license_number` (String) Professional license number
- `member_type` (String) Discriminator field indicating this is a player
Available values: "player", "coach", "medical_staff", "equipment_manager".
- `position` (String) Playing position on the field
Available values: "goalkeeper", "defender", "midfielder", "forward".
- `qualifications` (List of String) Medical qualifications and degrees
- `responsibilities` (List of String) List of responsibilities
- `specialty` (String) Coaching specialty/role
Available values: "head_coach", "assistant_coach", "goalkeeping_coach", "fitness_coach", "tactical_analyst", "team_doctor", "physiotherapist", "sports_psychologist", "nutritionist", "massage_therapist".
- `team_id` (String) ID of the team they belong to
- `win_rate` (Number) Career win rate (0.0 to 1.0)
- `years_with_team` (Number) Number of years with the current team
